name: Attackin' the Kraken
description:
Defend your pirate ship. Defeat the Kraken!

Use the arrow keys to maneuver Pirate Ahab from cannon to cannon to shoot at the oncoming Kraken before your ship takes too much damage.

Press the space bar to fire the cannons!

Created by Trevor Stroud and Arielle McMahon in 48 hours for the 48 Secret Jam – January 2018

Sound effects by Mike Koenig and Daniel Simon // Music with Wolfram Tones
